footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 09/26/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Key of Khaj-Nisut__ The HP% substat and passive in addition to the Elemental Mastery scaling nature of the weapon make it the best weapon for a healer Kuki.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Freedom Sworn, Iron Sting, Favonius Sword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Elemental Master |<goblet>  HP% or Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Healing Bonus or HP% or Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Kuki's Burst is not a priority for a healing build as it does not provide any utility unless she has a 4 piece Noblesse Oblige.
